Patent Information.Patent Title: Antimicrobial peptides antibodies and nucleic acid molecules from bovine neutrophils.
Patent Information.Abstract: The present invention provides a new family of cysteine-rich antimicrobial peptides isolated from bovine neutrophils herein named beta defensins. Thirteen structurally homologous peptides were purified to homogeneity from a granule-rich cytoplasmic fraction of purified blood neutrophils. These antimicrobial compounds are useful in human and veterinary medicine, and as agents in agricultural, food science, and industrial applications.

Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Bovine Beta-defensin 11 (bBD-11; BNBD-11; BNDB-11; mammals, animals)
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Gram-positive bacterium:Staphylococcus aureus 502A (MIC=10-300 µg/ml);Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli ML35 (MIC=10-300 µg/ml).
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: No hemolysis information or data found in the reference(s) presented in this entry
Sequence Information.Function: Has bactericidal activity. Active against E. coli ML35 and S. aureus 502A.

Literature.Title: Purification, primary structures, and antibacterial activities of beta-defensins, a new family of antimicrobial peptides from bovine neutrophils.
Literature.Author: Selsted ME, Tang YQ, Morris WL, McGuire PA, Novotny MJ, Smith W, Henschen AH, Cullor JS.

Literature.Title: Bovine beta-defensins: identification and characterization of novel bovine beta-defensin genes and their expression in mammary gland tissue.
